languages.text: Впрочем, вскоре участники каннибалистического пиршества пожалели о своей алчности. Сплотившись вокруг Маражая Эзирраеша, уцелевшие воины Опустошительной бури дали внезапный отпор. Многие кабалы расхитителей потеряли столько воинов, что сами оказались соблазнительной добычей для стервятников. Бросив падальщикам кровавую добычу, Опустошительная буря получила шанс уцелеть и возродиться в прежней силе.
languages.translation_comment:
Игрок по квесту Маражая возродил кабал
Маражай в пати
Игрок не поклонился Ктану

languages.text: However, the participants of the cannibalistic feasting soon came to regret their rapacity. After rallying around Marazhai Aezyrraesh, the surviving warriors of the Reaving Tempest delivered a surprise counter-attack. Many of the plundering Kabals lost so many fighters that they in turn became tempting prey for vultures. By throwing this bloody carrion to the scavengers, the Reaving Tempest seized its chance to survive and return to its former strength.
languages.original_text: Впрочем, вскоре участники каннибалистического пиршества пожалели о своей алчности. Сплотившись вокруг Маражая Эзирраеша, уцелевшие воины Опустошительной бури дали внезапный отпор. Многие кабалы расхитителей потеряли столько воинов, что сами оказались соблазнительной добычей для стервятников. Бросив падальщикам кровавую добычу, Опустошительная буря получила шанс уцелеть и возродиться в прежней силе.

Many of the plundering Kabals lost so many fighters that they in turn became tempting prey for vultures. By throwing this bloody carrion to the scavengers, the Reaving Tempest seized its chance to survive and return to its former strength.

However, the participants of the cannibalistic feasting soon came to regret their rapacity. After rallying around Marazhai Aezyrraesh, the surviving warriors of the Reaving Tempest delivered a surprise counter-attack. Many of the plundering Kabals lost so many fighters that they in turn became tempting prey for vultures. By throwing this bloody carrion to the scavengers, the Reaving Tempest seized its chance to survive and return to its former strength.

languages.text: Cependant, les participants à l'orgie cannibale n'ont pas tardé à regretter leur rapacité. Rassemblés sous la bannière de Marazhai Aezyrraesh, les guerriers rescapés de la Tempête ravageuse ont aussitôt lancé une riposte surprise. Leurs combattants décimés, les Kabales carnassières sont devenues à leur tour des proies toutes désignées pour les charognards de tout poil. En livrant leur carcasse sanguinolente aux vautours, la Tempête ravageuse a saisi la chance qui s'offrait à elle d'assurer sa survie et de renouer avec sa grandeur passée.
languages.original_text: However, the participants of the cannibalistic feasting soon came to regret their rapacity. After rallying around Marazhai Aezyrraesh, the surviving warriors of the Reaving Tempest delivered a surprise counter-attack. Many of the plundering Kabals lost so many fighters that they in turn became tempting prey for vultures. By throwing this bloody carrion to the scavengers, the Reaving Tempest seized its chance to survive and return to its former strength.

traits.locale_text: Cependant, les participants à l'orgie cannibale n'ont pas tardé à regretter leur rapacité. Rassemblés sous la bannière de Marazhai Aezyrraesh, les guerriers rescapés de la Tempête ravageuse ont aussitôt lancé une riposte surprise. Leurs combattants décimés, les Kabales carnassières sont devenues à leur tour des proies toutes désignées pour les charognards de tout poil. En livrant leur carcasse sanguinolente aux vautours, la Tempête ravageuse a saisi la chance qui s'offrait à elle d'assurer sa survie et de renouer avec sa grandeur passée.

languages.text: Die Teilnehmer des kannibalistischen Gelages bereuten ihren Hunger jedoch schon bald. Nachdem sich die überlebenden Krieger des plündernden Sturms um Marazhai Aezyrraesh geschart hatten, unternahmen sie einen überraschenden Gegenangriff. Viele der plündernden Kabalen verloren so viele Krieger, dass sie selbst zu verlockender Beute für Aasgeier wurden. Indem der plündernde Sturm die Kadaver der Rivalen diesen Aasfressern vorwarf, konnte er überleben und wieder zu alter Stärke gelangen.
languages.original_text: However, the participants of the cannibalistic feasting soon came to regret their rapacity. After rallying around Marazhai Aezyrraesh, the surviving warriors of the Reaving Tempest delivered a surprise counter-attack. Many of the plundering Kabals lost so many fighters that they in turn became tempting prey for vultures. By throwing this bloody carrion to the scavengers, the Reaving Tempest seized its chance to survive and return to its former strength.

traits.locale_text: Die Teilnehmer des kannibalistischen Gelages bereuten ihren Hunger jedoch schon bald. Nachdem sich die überlebenden Krieger des plündernden Sturms um Marazhai Aezyrraesh geschart hatten, unternahmen sie einen überraschenden Gegenangriff. Viele der plündernden Kabalen verloren so viele Krieger, dass sie selbst zu verlockender Beute für Aasgeier wurden. Indem der plündernde Sturm die Kadaver der Rivalen diesen Aasfressern vorwarf, konnte er überleben und wieder zu alter Stärke gelangen.

languages.text: Sin embargo, los participantes de este festín caníbal pronto lamentaron su rapacidad. Tras reunirse en torno a Marazhai Aezyrraesh, los supervivientes de la Tempestad Asoladora lanzaron un contraataque sorpresa. Mucha de las Kábalas atacantes perdieron tantos guerreros como para convertirse en presas tentadoras a su vez. Aprovechando esta sangrienta carroña para distraer a los buitres, la Tempestad Asoladora usó la oportunidad para sobrevivir y recuperar su anterior poder.
languages.original_text: However, the participants of the cannibalistic feasting soon came to regret their rapacity. After rallying around Marazhai Aezyrraesh, the surviving warriors of the Reaving Tempest delivered a surprise counter-attack. Many of the plundering Kabals lost so many fighters that they in turn became tempting prey for vultures. By throwing this bloody carrion to the scavengers, the Reaving Tempest seized its chance to survive and return to its former strength.

traits.locale_text: Sin embargo, los participantes de este festín caníbal pronto lamentaron su rapacidad. Tras reunirse en torno a Marazhai Aezyrraesh, los supervivientes de la Tempestad Asoladora lanzaron un contraataque sorpresa. Mucha de las Kábalas atacantes perdieron tantos guerreros como para convertirse en presas tentadoras a su vez. Aprovechando esta sangrienta carroña para distraer a los buitres, la Tempestad Asoladora usó la oportunidad para sobrevivir y recuperar su anterior poder.

languages.text: しかし食人宴会の参加者たちは、すぐに自分たちの蛮行を後悔した。マラズハイ・アエジレシュ周囲に集結した〈略奪の嵐〉生き残りの戦士たちが、突然の奇襲を仕掛けたのだ。略奪を働いた陰謀団の多くは戦闘員を失い、逆に格好の餌食となった。ハイエナのような者たちに死骸を投げつけることで〈略奪の嵐〉は生き残り、かつての力を取り戻すチャンスをつかんだのだ。
languages.original_text: However, the participants of the cannibalistic feasting soon came to regret their rapacity. After rallying around Marazhai Aezyrraesh, the surviving warriors of the Reaving Tempest delivered a surprise counter-attack. Many of the plundering Kabals lost so many fighters that they in turn became tempting prey for vultures. By throwing this bloody carrion to the scavengers, the Reaving Tempest seized its chance to survive and return to its former strength.

traits.locale_text: しかし食人宴会の参加者たちは、すぐに自分たちの蛮行を後悔した。マラズハイ・アエジレシュ周囲に集結した〈略奪の嵐〉生き残りの戦士たちが、突然の奇襲を仕掛けたのだ。略奪を働いた陰謀団の多くは戦闘員を失い、逆に格好の餌食となった。ハイエナのような者たちに死骸を投げつけることで〈略奪の嵐〉は生き残り、かつての力を取り戻すチャンスをつかんだのだ。

languages.text: 然而，那些参加劫掠的阴谋团成员很快就为自己的贪婪付出了代价。狂风阴谋团幸存的战士们集结在玛拉斋·艾泽拉什麾下，迅速发起了令所有人始料不及的反击。在这场反击中，前来劫掠的阴谋团遭受了惨重伤亡，反而沦为了其他阴谋团的猎物。狂风阴谋团利用这个机会存活了下来，恢复了以往的力量。
languages.original_text: However, the participants of the cannibalistic feasting soon came to regret their rapacity. After rallying around Marazhai Aezyrraesh, the surviving warriors of the Reaving Tempest delivered a surprise counter-attack. Many of the plundering Kabals lost so many fighters that they in turn became tempting prey for vultures. By throwing this bloody carrion to the scavengers, the Reaving Tempest seized its chance to survive and return to its former strength.

traits.locale_text: 然而，那些参加劫掠的阴谋团成员很快就为自己的贪婪付出了代价。狂风阴谋团幸存的战士们集结在玛拉斋·艾泽拉什麾下，迅速发起了令所有人始料不及的反击。在这场反击中，前来劫掠的阴谋团遭受了惨重伤亡，反而沦为了其他阴谋团的猎物。狂风阴谋团利用这个机会存活了下来，恢复了以往的力量。

languages.text: Ancak yamyamca ziyafete katılanlar, kısa süre içinde açgözlülüklerinden pişman olacaklardı. Kalan Müfteris Kasırga savaşçıları, Marazhai Aezyrraesh'in etrafında toplanıp sürpriz bir karşı saldırı gerçekleştirdi. Yağmacı Kabalların birçoğu, çok sayıda savaşçı kaybetti ve en nihayetinde akbabalar için çekici birer hedefe dönüştü. Leşçillerin önüne böylesine kanlı bir leş atan Müfteris Kasırga, hayatta kalma ve eski gücünü geri kazanma fırsatını tepmemiş oldu.
languages.original_text: However, the participants of the cannibalistic feasting soon came to regret their rapacity. After rallying around Marazhai Aezyrraesh, the surviving warriors of the Reaving Tempest delivered a surprise counter-attack. Many of the plundering Kabals lost so many fighters that they in turn became tempting prey for vultures. By throwing this bloody carrion to the scavengers, the Reaving Tempest seized its chance to survive and return to its former strength.

traits.locale_text: Ancak yamyamca ziyafete katılanlar çok yakında açgözlülüklerinden pişman olacaklardı. Kalan Müfteris Kasırga savaşçıları Marazhai Aezyrraesh etrafında toplandılar ve sürpriz bir karşı saldırı gerçekleştirdiler. Yağmacı Kabalların birçoğu, çok sayıda savaşçı kaybetti ve sonuç olarak da akbabalar için çekici birer hedef hâline geldiler. Leşçillerin önüne böylesine kanlı bir leş atan Müfteris Kasırga, hayatta kalma ve eski gücünü geri kazanma şansını değerlendirmiş oldu.

languages.translation_comment:
Игрок по квесту Маражая возродил кабал
Маражай в пати
Игрок не поклонился Ктану
